reviewText: my family loves Raymond! we have the complete set and watch them regularly. Very entertaining for a wide range of ages.
It was agift and I have not heard any complaints

We received the DVD Everybody Loves Raymond Season 6&7 on time in new condition .  Your prompt courteous service was greatly appreciated.  This product will be a great addition to our library collection.  Thank you
This dvd box set is cool! The whole sitcom is as funny as hell! And you get two for the price of one! What more can you say!
This is one of the great tv shows that is very hard not to like. I have been watching this for awhile and just had to have these years for for Robbies wedding
these  DVD's  are  entertaining and give many laughs, no matter how many times you see them, they make you feel good!

I thought when i received them that the packaging had changed to the plastic cases.
But when i later bought S's 8&9 and they arrived in the thicker cardboard cases,
I'm disappointed.
I now have 7 seasons of the original cardboard style, & 2 seasons in the newer plastic style.
Everything is as good as it can be. My dad wanted it for Christmas, and it's what he always wanted. He's very happy to have it.
Love this show and wanted to have the collection so I could watch them whenever I want - great value.
I bought this because it seems like they only show a handful of the same episodes on T.V. And it was a great value to get 2 seasons for what you would pay for one.
HAVE PURCHASED THESE FOR A GIFT. HAVE GIVEN THEM TO THE PERSON BEFORE WORKIN TO HAVE THEM HAVE THE WHOLE SERIES

I got these as a gift for my father. He loves Raymond. He now has all the seasons. The only thing I didn't like is that these are in just a case the size of a DVD case. It has all 5 discs in it but not in the fold out case like the other seasons
gotta love everybody loves raymond! great show cant get enough of it! clean and very funny, Raymond will have you laughing for hours
Family sitcoms are very hard to come by these days, especially when you have a perfect cast.  Modern Family, The Goldbergs, and Last Man Standing are current sitcoms that have these special elements.
Great
good

If you enjoy this series and would like to have the option of watching anytime or maybe indulge in a Raymond marathon, this is the set for you.  The packaging is professional.  I have previously purchased the first 5 seasons and at this price, getting the 6th and 7th was an easy choice.  Five stars for price and quality.

Our family has grown tired of the filth that is on TV and decided to discontinue our TV service.  Although there are episodes of Everybody Loves Raymond i.e., "Just Say No" & "Halloween Candy," that are less than ideal for family viewing, they are, by and large, family-friendly and endlessly entertaining.  We watch the DVD's daily and never grow tired of them or not having TV service!
what a nice bonus to have 2 seasons in one. I enjoy watching this series as much as I enjoy shopping amazon.

What else can I say. Raymond and his family bring a smile to my face, and a Laugh out Loud.
I have all the seasons of Everybody love Raymond.  And I watch them repeatedly.  For a good
belly laugh, you must watch Everybody Loves Raymond.
A great show.  I've watched each episode repeatedly.  The characters in this show are every bit as hilarious as Seinfeld.
My collection is almost complete. I wanted every show to watch when I want and without any ads to skip over.
One of my all time favorite shows! Bought the entire series. Great cast and writing. Everybody Loves Raymond and the family!
